title: Sri Lanka removed from UN “child and armed conflict” list – LTTE must stand trial for forced conscription
content: By Shenali Waduge Unless it’s a mistake or purposely done the UN removal of Sri Lanka from its List of Shame for child conscription does not clearly distinguish the fact that it was the LTTE that conscripted children to its terror outfit and not Sri Lanka’s army.
